 with painted scallop-shaped rims.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a set of porcelain beaker and saucer. The body of the porcelain wares in this set is white.  Both have similar motifs, decorated with flowering branches and floral sprigs in red, blue and green. The body of both are slightly tiered, with painted scallop-shaped rims.
